name: ClickYourFarm
description:
Click your Farm v0.1

This is the reveal of our first game. It was done while a Game Jam and is in a early stage of development. All Assets are placeholders and will get replaced as soon we get an proper 2D Artist. In the first Version there is no Sound included since we got some issues on that end, but we will patch the coming weeks.

In this Game you own a new farm and have to manage fields on which you can grow your own stuff. Some current features are:

  • Day System
  • Growing fields over time
  • Basic Weather System
  • Simple AI for transportation
  • A Research Lab to reduce Clicks/Grow time/ reduce negative attributes trough Weather.

Upcoming features:

  • more corn variety
  • better 2D graphics
  • Sound
  • Shop for new trucks
  • more weather influence
  • Multiple Devices Support
  • Save your Game
  • Use the same Save Game for all devices
  • But we are open for your ideas let us know what you want to have in-game
